item.title: I've migrated to Wayland!
item.description: After a long time reading about Wayland, how X11 is old and unsafe, how the big DE are adopting it and many other things, I decided to give it a try now that Iâ€™m free for the vacations and check out how the world of the future is. TL;DR: the experience is not bad, and in several aspects better than X11, although with its disadvantages that not everyone is willing to accept.
